name: Chuck's Favorite Mac and Cheese
author: MRSO
summary: Easily doubled for a potluck, cottage cheese and sour cream are the unique elements to this macaroni and cheese recipe.
ingredients: 1 (8 ounce) package shredded sharp Cheddar cheese
1 (12 ounce) container small curd cottage cheese
directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil, add pasta, and cook until done; drain
In 9x13 inch baking dish, stir together macaroni, shredded Cheddar cheese, cottage cheese, sour cream, Parmesan cheese, salt and pepper
In a small bowl, mix together bread crumbs and melted butter
Bake 30 to 35 minutes, or until top is golden
